subSections.title: Glyph origin
Etymology
subSections.text: {{och-l|世}} is derived from iterative devoicing of {{och-l|葉|leaf|id=2}} + *''-s'' suffix, meaning successive foliages of a tree > generations. Compare {{cog|bo|ལོ་མ||leaf}}, Western {{cog|bo|ལོབ་མ||leaf}} and {{cog|bo|ལོ||year}}.
